body_content.explanation: an image of a particular person that is created by a computer to look and sound exactly like that person in real life, used for example in a computer game or in some scenes of a film:
examples: An actor does not own the copyright on his or her digital clones, unless they were created by her or him.
We make high-quality digital clones that can be used as avatars in games or virtual environments.

body_content.explanation: a computer program that learns to behave in the same way as a person, for example when working on a computer:
examples: A digital clone could operate at machine speed, making decisions and responding to emails as you would, then summarize what it has done.
The tool makes it possible to create a digital clone which could be used to supplement you at work - or replace you.
